channel.title: ClientHandler: Client Pker Disconnected (localhost)
channel.description:
when i try to log into my client from moparscape .. ican log in but then after 1-2secs it dc and goes back to front page n then on my "runclient" thing it says Clienthandler: Client Pker Diconnected (localhost):\ please help
heres the picture of it: [IMG]http://i761.photobucket.com/albums/xx253/smash1995/clientprob.jpg[/img]
